-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Parsec frontend to "her-lexer" for Haskell source code.
--   
--   Parsec frontend to <a>her-lexer</a> for Haskell source code.
@package her-lexer-parsec
@version 0.0.0

module Language.Haskell.Her.Parsec
haskellTokenStream :: String -> String -> [(SourcePos, Tok)]
litC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (String -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
opeC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (BK -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
cloC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (BK -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
uidC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (String -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
lidC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (String -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
kwC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (String -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
symC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (String -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
spcC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (String -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
comC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (String -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
urkC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (Char -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
nlC :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => ((String, Int) -> Bool) -> Parsec s u Tok
lit :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => String -> Parsec s u Tok
ope :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => BK -> Parsec s u Tok
clo :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => BK -> Parsec s u Tok
uid :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => String -> Parsec s u Tok
lid :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => String -> Parsec s u Tok
kw :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => String -> Parsec s u Tok
sym :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => String -> Parsec s u Tok
semi :: GenParser (SourcePos, Tok) st Tok
spc :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => String -> Parsec s u Tok
com :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => String -> Parsec s u Tok
urk :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => Char -> Parsec s u Tok
nl :: Stream s Identity (SourcePos, Tok) => (String, Int) -> Parsec s u Tok
